text:
each group and the 
programme is available to 
expectant parents and parents 
with young children.
For further information visit 
www.aware-ni.org
Help and support 
If you think you are depressed, 
contact your GP or health 
visitor and explain how you are 
feeling. Your partner or a friend 
could contact them for you if 
you want. 
If you have twins or triplets, 
you are more likely to 
experience postnatal and 
longer-term depression. 
This is mainly because of the 
additional stress of caring
